meanings.definition: A large, strong bolt used to secure the front axle of a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic tightened the kingbolts to keep the wheels in place.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the kingbolts regularly to ensure they are secure.
meanings.sent3: When the kingbolts decided to take a break, the car's wheels went on strike!
meanings.sent4: The kingbolts were the knights guarding the wheels' castle.
meanings.sent5: The shiny kingbolts gleamed under the car, holding everything together.

meanings.definition: A crucial or central element or component.
meanings.sent1: Communication is the kingbolts of a successful team.
meanings.sent2: Patience and hard work are the kingbolts of achieving your goals.
meanings.sent3: The kingbolts of the recipe were missing, so the cake turned out strange.
meanings.sent4: Trust is the kingbolts that hold relationships strong.
meanings.sent5: Laughter acts as the kingbolts in bringing joy to our lives.
